sqlMap.select:
/* ! [G20] 사용불가 기능 */ /* DevMgrBuildAssistSQL.xml - BuildCmsExCardMinusButtonCount */
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS INTEGER) AS btnCnt FROM $DB_NEOS$T_EX_BUTTON WHERE COMP_SEQ = 'EXP_BUTTON' AND FORM_SEQ = '0' AND PAGE_SEQ = '10' AND CALL_URL = 'fnDefault_cardUseHistoryWithCancel'
sqlMap.insert:
/* ! [G20] 사용불가 기능 */ /* DevMgrBuildAssistSQL.xml - BuildCmsExCardMinusButton */
INSERT INTO $DB_NEOS$t_ex_button ( comp_seq, form_seq, page_seq, btn_seq, `position` , order_num, display_yn, license_yn, btn_size, nm_basic , nm_kr, nm_en, nm_jp, nm_cn, default_yn , default_code, call_url, call_param, callback_url, callback_type , callback_key, `default_elemId`, `default_elemClass`, ext_url) VALUES( 'EXP_BUTTON', 0, 10, 1717, 20 , 99, 'N', 'Y', 203, '카드사용내역(취소분 포함)' , '카드사용내역(취소분 포함)', '', '', '', 'Y' , 'cardUseHistoryWithCancel', 'fnDefault_cardUseHistoryWithCancel', '{}', '', 0 , '', NULL, NULL, NULL);

/* 예산연동 옵션 */ INSERT IGNORE INTO $DB_NEOS$t_co_code_detail ( `detail_code`, `code`, `ischild`, `order_num`, `flag_1`, `flag_2`, `use_yn`, `create_seq`, `create_date`, `modify_seq`, `modify_date` ) VALUE ( 'Y', 'ex00028', 'N', 2, NULL, NULL, 'Y', 'SYSTEM', NOW(), 'SYSTEM', NOW() );

/* 예산연동 옵션 */ INSERT IGNORE INTO $DB_NEOS$t_co_code_detail_multi ( `detail_code`, `code`, `lang_code`, `detail_name`, `note`, `use_yn`, `create_seq`, `create_date`, `modify_seq`, `modify_date` ) VALUE ( 'Y', 'ex00028', 'kr', '사용', '사용', 'Y', 'SYSTEM', NOW(), 'SYSTEM', NOW() );

/* 법인카드 연동 */ INSERT IGNORE INTO $DB_NEOS$t_ex_cms_sync SELECT comp_seq , 'Y' AS 'cms_sync_yn' , 'Y' AS 'cms_batch_yn' , 'N' AS 'cms_process_yn' , 'N' AS 'custom_yn' , '20200301' AS 'cms_base_date' , '30' AS 'cms_base_day' , 'N' AS 'run_yn' , NOW() AS 'modify_date' , '' AS module_Type , '' AS log_type , '' AS message , NOW() AS create_date ,'DEF' AS server_ip FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp;

INSERT IGNORE INTO $DB_NEOS$`t_ex_summary` ( `comp_seq`, `summary_code`, `summary_name`,`summary_div`, `dr_acct_code`, `dr_acct_name`, `cr_acct_code`, `cr_acct_name`, `vat_acct_code`, `vat_acct_name`, `bank_partner_code`, `bank_partner_name`, `create_seq`, `create_date`, `modify_seq`, `modify_date`, `order_num` ) SELECT comp_seq , #summary_code# AS summary_code , #summary_name# AS summary_name , 'A' AS summary_div , #dr_acct_code# AS dr_acct_code , #dr_acct_name# AS dr_acct_name , #cr_acct_code# AS cr_acct_code , #cr_acct_name# AS cr_acct_name , #vat_acct_code# AS vat_acct_code , #vat_acct_name# AS vat_acct_name , '' AS bank_partner_code , '' AS bank_partner_name , 'SYSTEM' AS create_seq , NOW() AS create_date , 'SYSTEM' AS modify_seq , NOW() AS modify_date , '0' AS order_num FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp WHERE comp_cd = #compCd#
select 'DeleteCMS SUCCES'

INSERT IGNORE INTO $DB_NEOS$`t_ex_auth` ( `comp_seq`, `auth_div`, `order_num`, `auth_code`, `auth_name`, `cash_type`, `cr_acct_code`, `cr_acct_name`, `vat_acct_code`, `vat_acct_name`, `vat_type_code`, `vat_type_name`, `erp_auth_code`, `erp_auth_name`, `auth_required_yn`, `partner_required_yn`, `card_required_yn`, `project_required_yn`, `note_required_yn`, `no_tax_code`, `no_tax_name`, `use_yn`, `create_seq`, `create_date`, `modify_seq`, `modify_date`, `va_type_code`, `va_type_name` ) SELECT comp_seq ,'A' AS auth_div ,#order_num# AS order_num ,#auth_code# AS auth_code ,#auth_name# AS auth_name ,IFNULL(#cash_type#, 'N') AS cash_type ,#cr_acct_code# AS cr_acct_code ,#cr_acct_name# AS cr_acct_name ,#vat_acct_code# AS vat_acct_code ,#vat_acct_name# AS vat_acct_name ,#vat_type_code# AS vat_type_code ,#vat_type_name# AS vat_type_name ,'' AS erp_auth_code ,'' AS erp_auth_name ,IFNULL(#auth_required_yn#, 'Y') AS auth_required_yn ,IFNULL(#partner_required_yn#, 'Y') AS partner_required_yn ,IFNULL(#card_required_yn#, 'Y') AS card_required_yn ,IFNULL(#project_required_yn#, 'Y') AS project_required_yn ,IFNULL(#note_required_yn#, 'Y') AS note_required_yn ,'' AS no_tax_code ,'' AS no_tax_name ,'Y' AS use_yn ,'SYSTEM' AS create_seq ,NOW() AS create_date ,'SYSTEM' AS modify_seq ,NOW() AS modify_date ,'' AS va_type_code ,'' AS va_type_name FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp WHERE comp_cd = #compCd#
sqlMap.update:
/* ! (비영리 1.0) 참조품의 권한 설정 수정 */ /* DevMgrBuildAssistSQL.xml - UpdateConfferAuth */ UPDATE $DB_NEOS$g20_cons_auth SET gbn_org = #auth_type#
, seq = #auth_obj_seq#
, seq = #auth_obj_seq#
, seq = ( select ed.comp_seq from $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_dept ed where ed.emp_seq = auth.emp_seq and main_comp_yn = 'y' )
,modify_dt = NOW() WHERE auth_seq = #auth_seq#
sqlMap.select: /* 회사 코드 조회 */ SELECT comp_seq ,comp_name FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_comp_multi
sqlMap.insert:
/* ! (비영리 1.0) 참조품의 권한 히스토리 관리 */ /* DevMgrBuildAssistSQL.xml - backupConfferAuth */
INSERT INTO $DB_NEOS$g20_cons_auth_history (history_type, auth_seq, group_seq, emp_seq, gbn_org, seq, create_seq, create_dt, modify_seq, modify_dt) SELECT #history_type# , auth_seq , group_seq , emp_seq , gbn_org , seq , create_seq , create_dt , modify_seq , modify_dt FROM $DB_NEOS$g20_cons_auth where auth_seq = #auth_seq#;
